DOC.brief_summary: The present study adopt evaluate pharmacokinetics sulpiride oral administration .
DOC.brief_title: Therapeutic Drug Monitoring Pharmacokinetic Compartmental Analysis Sulpiride After Oral Administration Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The present study adopt evaluate pharmacokinetics sulpiride administration single oral dos 50 mg open-label , one-way study .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year old 45 healthy male volunteer Actual weight Â± 30 % ideal body weight base sex , height , body frame Who pass screen parameter Free drug exposure know interfere pharmacokinetics assay sulpiride least 10 day prior study Who able communicate effectively study personnel , literate , able give consent . A clinically significant abnormal physical exam , medical history , laboratory study If show sit SBP > 140 < 100 mmHg , DBP > 90 < 60mm Hg , pulse rate > 95 < 50 beats/min screen A history serious intolerance , allergy , sensitivity fexofenadine The use prescription drug within previous month use overthecounter medication ( exception acetaminophen ) within past 14 day A history blood dyscrasias A history alcohol drug abuse within past year Donation blood 8 week prior study plan donate blood within 8 week complete study Unable tolerate vein puncture multiple blood sampling Any surgical/medical condition might alter drug absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion Can follow instruction , opinion investigator .
